+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[Map:10:3:0:2]
Yes
No
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:4]
-Binding a spirit in a sword-
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:5]
A helpful and informative guide to 
capturing and keeping evil spirits inside
archaic weapons.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:6]
Throughtout the ages many famous swords
have contained the spirits of great demons, 
which when used correctly are deadly.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:7]
Perhaps one of the most famous examples
of this is the blade Muramasa, which houses 
a great demon known for the power of hypnosis.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:8]
It's said the curse cannot be broken until the
blood of the one who cast it is spilt.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:9]
It was lost several decades ago in a great
battle when an evil warlord used to control the
peasants of a village.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:10:3:0:10]
It's believed to rest somewhere outside 
the city of Carthage, though no ones sure 
of it's exact location.

EVENT 1   EV_Old_Woman   (11, 14)
________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________
PAGE 1
________________________________________________________________
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:1]
*The old woman seems to be lost in
thought, until she notices you.*  Oh, hello
stranger.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[Map:29:1:0:2]
Hello.  Something wrong?
Goodbye.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:4]
\nm[Old Woman]
*She smiles* I have some beasts in my
basement and I'm too old to get them out.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:5]
I'll have to visit the guild and let them know
that I need someone to clear them out
for me.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[Map:29:1:0:6]
I could help you, ma'am.
I'll help, for a price.
Bad luck, well  I'm leaving.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:8]
*Another warm smile appears on her
face.* 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:9]
\nm[Old Woman]
Bless you, child. You can find
the basement entrance in the kitchen.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:13]
You will find a blood-thirsty reptile.  Bring
me it's head and I know you slain the 
leader of the beasts.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:14]
*Garnet asks where the beast came from,
yet the old woman just smiles, mentioning
that this is a normal problem in her house.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:19]
\nm[Old Woman]
*Her smile turns into a smirk.*  Oh?  I may
be able to scrounge up some gold for you.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:0:20]
Empty my basement of these beasts and
visit me again.  You'll find the entrance
in the kitchen.
________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________
PAGE 2
________________________________________________________________
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:0]
Have you slain the rabid reptile, my dear?
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[Map:29:1:1:1]
I have the head.
No.  I'll return later.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:6]
*Another odd grin appears on her face.*
So you do have the naga's head.  Let me
open my purse, child.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:7]
*The old woman pulls out a small pouch
and reaches into it.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:8]
*Suddenly her hand comes out in a blur
with dust flying into Garnet's face!*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:9]
*Before Garnet could draw her weapon,
her vision darkens and she looses
consciousness.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:26]
*Another warm smile stretches her thin
lips.*  Child, you were most helpful.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:27]
I may have something that may be of aid
in your travels.  It may make you more
"aware" of what others say.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:28]
*She hands you a surprisingly well crafted
amulet.  Garnet senses magic emanating
from the accessory.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:29]
*Yet the magic seems to make Garnet feel
dizzy, like she is not fully in control of
herself.  However it seems to tense her--
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:30]
muscles more.  When Garnet looks up
to thank the woman, she realizes that she
vanished with no sound!*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:29:1:1:41]
*Sighs*  Ladies like you shouldn't tell lies.
Return when you got the rat's head.
________________________________________________________________

still glistening with reptilian cream.*

and finds the remains of her clothing nearby.
They look like they were be torn apart by daggers.*

legs as she dresses herself.*

her pain as she must continue on her adventure.*

MAP 31
################################################################


////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
EVENT 4   EV_Controller   (0, 0)
________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________
PAGE 1
________________________________________________________________
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:3]
*Garnet starts to feel the effects of the
dust loosen on her mind.  She senses
that she is on something rough and cold.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:5]
*A metal gate suddenly closed nearby.
Garnet groaned softly and finally found
the power to open her eyes.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:7]
*Garnet realizes that she is left in her
underwear!  She tries covering herself
up quickly.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:8]
*Through the gates Garnet recognizes
the old woman.  This time her face seems
alive with malice than kindness earlier.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:9]
\nm[Old Woman]
Are you awake, child?  Good, I want to
see your reaction as you get your payment.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:10]
\nm[]*Her hands whip through the air quickly
and she starts speaking in a foreign tongue.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:23]
*A sneer stretches the old crone's lips
from ear to ear.  She rests her hands to
her side, already finishing her incantation.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:24]
\nm[Old Woman]
If you knew who I was, you should know
better then to ask for "payment".
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:25]
You will have to be punished, child.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:26]
\nm[]*She snaps her fingers, and the summoned
abominations turn to slither their way towards
Garnet.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:31]
*Garnet tries fighting the creatures off,
yet the cold-blooded Nagas force her to
the ground with ease.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:32]
*What little clothing Garnet has on served
little in protecting herself.  The reptiles
quickly ripped them to shreds.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:35]
*Garnet could only scream as she is held
down and stripped nude.  She now realizes
what her "payment" is.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:39]
*Cold, prehensile phalli invade her precious
holes.  Garnet screamed before she was
muffled by a slimy tentacle.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:44]
*Tears streamed down her face as her
body is violated by the magical creatures.
Their barbed sex organs quickly pumping into her.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:57]
*Through her whimpering and wet sloshing
of reptilian tendrils invading her holes,
Garnet hears the old woman speak to her.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:58]
\nm[Old Woman]
Do you like being a slut for my creations,
child?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:59]
\nm[Old Woman]
I figured you were a kinky whore
when I first met you.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:60]
I bet you wanted this all along, and that is
why you angered me with demanding for
payment.  Am I right, naga-slut?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:62]
\nm[]*The brutal violation of her body starts
to speed up as Garnet catches sight
of the old woman grasping the bars.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:63]
*The old woman's face is twisted in lewd
lust, anger and insanity.  Her eyes burn
with old power and pleasure from inflicting torture.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:64]
\nm[Old Woman]
ANSWER ME NAGA-SLUT!!  DID YOU JUST
COME HERE TO FUCK MY FAMILY?!?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:78]
*Garnet can only whimper as the beasts
start howling in delight.  One clawed hand
grabs and squeezes one of her orbs painfully.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:108]
*Cold, alien ichor paints itself over Garnet's
birth and intestinal walls.  The tendril invading
her mouth pulls out to splash her face with it's goo.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:109]
*The old woman seems to shudder at the
climax, slouching against the bars and
breathing heavily.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:110]
*When she looks up, her eyes look relieved,
yet still full of immense power. She grins
maliciously toward Garnet's violated body.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:111]
You look like you enjoyed that, Naga-slut.
I would love to keep you and give you to my
other beauties...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:112]
...But I will need to pack up and leave.
Your whorish ways forced me to come
out of retirement.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:113]
*She giggles, sounding like a young girl
drunk with power than an old woman
broken by age.*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:114]
I'm sure you had fun, whore.  I would
love to meet you again...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:31:4:0:115]
*Her hands clap together and suddenly,
everything goes dark in Garnet's vision.*
________________________________________________________________

EVENT 2   EV002   (3, 6)
________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________
PAGE 2
________________________________________________________________
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:0]
\nm[]\face[]There's an old book on the wooden floor.
Its pages are yellow and the text is
not very clear, but you can read some.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:1]
I'm writing these words with drops of
sweat on my forehead. I can hear...
It's coming for me... it took my wife...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:2]
My daughter, Elsa, was first victim. I
listened to her screams... Gods,
forgive me... then it took my wife.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:3]
She didn't resist much longer than
Elsa. Now it's stopped. For how long?
I can only guess...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:4]
I know that I still can escape... but they
are there, in the basement. Their dead
bodies... I can't leave them.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:5]
It's all my fault. My damn curiosity that
made that demonic creature come to
this world. Who did I think I was?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:6]
That golden egg... it was the source of
all this evil. I was so blind, so stupid...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:7]
I have to face my destiny. Now I will go
down and try to seal that monster. 
Even if it means my death...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:90:2:1:8]
Elsa, Helena... I will be with you soon.
I hope that you'll forgive me... and you,
if you're reading this text, please...

the armorer's young son at the moment.

But after a few months, she noticed 
something changed about her body.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:148:6:0:66]
A few weeks later, she stands in front of her 
mirror.

________________________________________________________________

PAGE 1

-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:1]
\nm[]\face[]An old woman walks restless
in the graveyard.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:2]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Dear... my...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:3]
\nm[Garnet]Hello?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:5]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Ah!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:6]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Don't scare me like that!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:7]
\nm[Garnet]I'm sorry, I didn't mean to startle you.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:8]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Oh, be still my beating old 
heart!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:10]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Why are you out here in this 
darkness?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:11]
\nm[Garnet]I was wondering what you were doing.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:12]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Oh, can an old woman visit the 
graveyard by herself anymore?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:14]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Did you think I returned to 
reclaim my old husband did you?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:16]
\nm[Garnet]Oh he should be nice and stiff by now I 
guess.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:19]
\nm[Garnet]What!? No! I was just...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:22]
\nm[]\face[]The old woman looks with suspicious 
eyes at \c[6]Garnet\c[0].
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:23]
\nm[]\face[]I don't recognize you, who's daughter are 
you?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:24]
\nm[Garnet]Oh, my dad's Prome-
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:25]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]So you're not from here then.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:27]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Hm...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:28]
\nm[Garnet]-theus
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:30]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Say, you don't happen to be 
traveling with an adventurer, are you?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:31]
\nm[Garnet]Well I happen to be an Adventurer!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:32]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]... a male Adventurer?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:33]
\nm[Garnet]What?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:34]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Do you know a male 
adventurer?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:35]
\nm[Garnet]I'm as good as any other adventurer!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:36]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]hm... no, no. That's no good 
idea. I really need a male adventurer.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:37]
\nm[Garnet]I'll prove it to you!
Just tell me what you need!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:39]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]*sigh*
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:41]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]I didn't want this, but I guess I 
have to.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:42]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Deep in the forest to the north 
you'll find a clearing.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:43]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]In this clearing there's a large 
tree decorating two graves.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:44]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Between these graves is a 
statue I need you to recover.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:45]
\nm[Garnet]Already on it!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:46]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]I... see...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:47]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Make sure you don't pick it up 
yourself.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:48]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]Follow the old overgrown path 
past the fields, and you will find it in clearing not long 
from here.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:151:1:0:49]
\nm[Old Woman]\face[]And remember, it is not for 
your hands!

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
EVENT 2   Hunchback   (9, 3)
________________________________________________________________

________________________________________________________________
PAGE 1
________________________________________________________________
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:1]
\nm[Garnet]
Here you go!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:2]
\nm[Hunchback]\face[]
Oh?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:3]
\nm[]\face[]
The hunchback weighs the bag in his hand.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:4]
\nm[Hunchback]\face[]
Is this really a million gold?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:5]
\nm[Hunchback]\face[]
We hoped you would be able to do this, we're all 
really impressed!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:6]
\nm[]\face[]The hunchback puts the bag on the 
counter, and starts counting the gold coins.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:7]
\nm[]\face[]Every coin counted is placed between 
each finger, first in his left hand, then in his right.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:8]
\nm[]\face[]With his fingers holding the gold, he 
moves hands to his pockets.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:9]
\nm[]\face[]The sound of metals colliding can 
be heard through his pockets.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:10]
\nm[]\face[]The hunchback returns his hands to the 
counter, free of coin.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:11]
\nm[]\face[]With focus, the hunchback starts counting 
the left in the bag, placing one coin between each 
finger on his plump hands. 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:12]
\nm[]\face[]Once filled, he drops the coins in his 
pocket.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:13]
\nm[]\face[]The hunchback continues this pattern 
once more, carefully placing, idly dropping.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:14]
\nm[]\face[]On the forth repetition, after the 
hunchback has filled his left hand, he takes the last 
two pieces of gold from the bag.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:15]
\nm[]\face[]The hunchback places the two last coins 
between his thumb and index finger, and brings them 
to the level of Garnet eyes.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:16]
\nm[]\face[]
A sudden feeling of anxiety grips \c[9]Garnet\c[0].
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:17]
\nm[Hunchback]\face[]
I know you want to take it and throw it far away, but 
it’s necessary.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:18]
\nm[]\face[]Bending behind the desk, the hunchback 
produces a paper.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:154:2:0:19]
\nm[]\face[]With a feeling of relief Garnet quickly 
pockets the paper.
________________________________________________________________
